if you're taking your pasta out of the

on top of the pasta then you're doing it
all

to save that water cuz that's going to

because it's going to give you a silky

and let the pasta get cold and sticky
don't dump the sauce on top of the

right way to Sauce your pasta take the
hot pasta out of the pasta water and put
it inside the pot with the hot sauce and
we're going to cook it together like a
minute that way the pasta can absorb
some of the sauce and it's just going to
become this great tasting stew together
now you didn't dump the pasta water down
the sink we still have a little that
starchy water and we're going to add
some of that water to the sauce to help
it give it that shiny yummy flavor after
the pasta And the sauce have cooked
together for like a minute we're going
to turn the heat off and we're going to
finish with a little bit of butter a
little bit of olive oil and a little bit
of cheese it's what the Italians call
manare which means to cream or to make
really smooth if you're going to add
fresh herbs it's always best to put them
at the end and mix it inside the pasta
instead of sprinkling on
